00020 const UINT32 SensorBase::kRelayChannels;
00021 const UINT32 SensorBase::kChassisSlots;
00022 UINT32 SensorBase::m_defaultAnalogModule = 1;
00023 UINT32 SensorBase::m_defaultDigitalModule = 4;
00024 UINT32 SensorBase::m_defaultSolenoidModule = 8;
00025 SensorBase *SensorBase::m_singletonList = NULL;
00026 
00027 // Slots are one based index, so ignore element 0.
00028 static const UINT32 modulePopulation[] = {0,  9201, 9201, 0, 9403, 0, 9403, 9472, 9472};
00029 
00033 SensorBase::SensorBase()
00034 {
00035 }

00040 SensorBase::~SensorBase()
00041 {
00042 }
00043 
00053 void SensorBase::AddToSingletonList()
00054 {
00055     m_nextSingleton = m_singletonList;
00056     m_singletonList = this;
00057 }
00058 
00064 void SensorBase::DeleteSingletons()
00065 {
00066     for (SensorBase *next = m_singletonList; next != NULL;)
00067     {
00068         SensorBase *tmp = next;
00069         next = next->m_nextSingleton;
00070         delete tmp;
00071     }
00072     m_singletonList = NULL;
00073 }
00074 
00081 void SensorBase::SetDefaultDigitalModule(UINT32 slot)
00082 {
00083     wpi_assert(slot <= kChassisSlots && modulePopulation[slot] == 9403);
00084     m_defaultDigitalModule = slot;
00085 }
00086 
00093 void SensorBase::SetDefaultAnalogModule(UINT32 slot)
00094 {
00095     wpi_assert(slot <= kChassisSlots && modulePopulation[slot] == 9201);
00096     m_defaultAnalogModule = slot;
00097 }
00098 
00103 void SensorBase::SetDefaultSolenoidModule(UINT32 slot)
00104 {
00105     wpi_assert(slot <= kChassisSlots && modulePopulation[slot] == 9472);
00106     m_defaultSolenoidModule = slot;
00107 }
00108 
00113 bool SensorBase::CheckDigitalModule(UINT32 slot)
00114 {
00115     if (slot <= kChassisSlots && modulePopulation[slot] == 9403)
00116         return true;
00117     wpi_fatal(IndexOutOfRange);
00118     return false;
00119 }
00120 
00125 bool SensorBase::CheckRelayModule(UINT32 slot)
00126 {
00127     return CheckDigitalModule(slot);
00128 }
00129 
00134 bool SensorBase::CheckPWMModule(UINT32 slot)
00135 {
00136     return CheckDigitalModule(slot);
00137 }
00138 
00143 bool SensorBase::CheckAnalogModule(UINT32 slot)
00144 {
00145     if (slot <= kChassisSlots && modulePopulation[slot] == 9201)
00146         return true;
00147     wpi_fatal(IndexOutOfRange);
00148     return false;
00149 }
00150 
00155 bool SensorBase::CheckSolenoidModule(UINT32 slot)
00156 {
00157     if (slot <= kChassisSlots && modulePopulation[slot] == 9472)
00158         return true;
00159     wpi_fatal(IndexOutOfRange);
00160     return false;
00161 }
00162 
00168 bool SensorBase::CheckDigitalChannel(UINT32 channel)
00169 {
00170     if (channel > 0 && channel <= kDigitalChannels)
00171         return true;
00172     wpi_fatal(IndexOutOfRange);
00173     return false;
00174 }
00175 
00181 bool SensorBase::CheckRelayChannel(UINT32 channel)
00182 {
00183     if (channel > 0 && channel <= kRelayChannels)
00184         return true;
00185     wpi_fatal(IndexOutOfRange);
00186     return false;
00187 }
00188 
00194 bool SensorBase::CheckPWMChannel(UINT32 channel)
00195 {

00198     wpi_fatal(IndexOutOfRange);
00199     return false;

00210         return true;
00211     wpi_fatal(IndexOutOfRange);
00212     return false;
